languages.text: {n}Леди-Навигатор прикрывает глаза, и дрожь в ее теле постепенно утихает. Усталым движением девушка поправляет налобное украшение, осторожно прикрывая око навигатора, и вы более не чувствуете исходящую от нее угрозу.{/n} "Спа...сибо? Благодаря вашим словам, мне стало чуточку лучше..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Леди-навигатор прикрывает глаза, и дрожь в ее теле постепенно утихает. Усталым движением девушка поправляет налобное украшение, осторожно прикрывая Око Навигатора, и вы более не чувствуете исходящую от нее угрозу.{/n} "Спа...сибо? Благодаря вашим словам, мне стало чуточку лучше..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."
languages.original_text: {n}Леди-Навигатор прикрывает глаза, и дрожь в ее теле постепенно утихает. Благодаря вашим словам, мне стало чуточку лучше..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes, and the tremors in her body slowly come to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they... they helped. I feel a little better..."

languages.text: {n}カシアは目を閉じると、体の震えが徐々に止まる。疲れたような手の動きで、彼女は航宙士の目を覆うように注意しながら額の装飾を調整する。すると、さっきまで彼女から発せられていた威圧感が消える。{/n}「ありがとう…ございました。あなたの言葉のおかげで助かりました。さっきより気分が良くなりました…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは目を閉じると、体の震えが徐々に止まる。疲れたような手の動きで、彼女は航宙士の目を覆うように注意しながら額の装飾を調整する。すると、さっきまで彼女から発せられていた威圧感が消える。{/n}「ありがとう…ございました。あなたの言葉のおかげで助かりました。さっきより気分が良くなりました…」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅闭上眼睛，身体逐渐停止了颤抖。她疲惫地伸出手来，调整着额头上的饰物，小心翼翼地遮住了第三只眼。她身上刚刚散发出来的威胁气息，此刻已消失得无影无踪。{/n}“谢……谢谢？你的话……很有帮助。我感觉好点了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅闭上眼睛，身体逐渐停止了颤抖。她疲惫地伸出手来，调整着额头上的饰物，小心翼翼地遮住了第三只眼。她身上刚刚散发出来的威胁气息，此刻已消失得无影无踪。{/n}“谢……谢谢？你的话，呃，很有帮助。我感觉好一点了……”

languages.text: {n}Cassia cierra los ojos y los temblores de su cuerpo se detienen. Con un movimiento cansado de la mano, se ajusta el adorno de la frente, asegurándose de cubrir su ojo de Navegante, y ya no sientes el peligro que emanaba de ella hace un momento.{/n} «¿Gracias?... Tus palabras me han ayudado. Me encuentro un poco mejor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia cierra los ojos y los temblores de su cuerpo se detienen. Con un movimiento cansado de la mano, se ajusta el adorno de la frente, asegurándose de cubrir su ojo de Navegante, y ya no sientes el peligro que emanaba de ella hace un momento.{/n} «¿Gracias?... Tus palabras me han ayudado. Me encuentro un poco mejor...».

languages.text: {n}Cassia schließt die Augen, und das Zittern in ihrem Körper verklingt. Mit einer erschöpften Bewegung ihrer Hand richtet sie sich den Stirnschmuck und bedeckt sorgfältig ihr Navigatorenauge. Die Gefahr, die eben noch von ihr ausging, ist nicht mehr zu spüren.{/n} "Ich danke ... Euch? Eure Worte haben geholfen. Ich fühle mich schon etwas besser ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia schließt die Augen, und das Zittern in ihrem Körper verklingt. Mit einer erschöpften Bewegung ihrer Hand richtet sie sich den Stirnschmuck und bedeckt sorgfältig ihr Navigatorenauge. Die Gefahr, die eben noch von ihr ausging, ist nicht mehr zu spüren.{/n} "D-Danke ...? Eure Worte, sie, äh, haben geholfen. Ich fühle mich schon etwas besser ..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia ferme les yeux et les tremblements qui agitaient son corps se font plus espacés jusqu'à disparaître complètement. D'un geste las, elle ajuste la pierre sur son front pour recouvrir son œil de navigatrice, dissipant toute sensation de menace.{/n} « Merci... je crois ? Vos paroles m'ont été d'une grande aide. Je me sens un peu mieux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia ferme les yeux et les tremblements qui agitaient son corps se font plus espacés jusqu'à disparaître complètement. D'un geste las, elle ajuste la pierre sur son front pour recouvrir son œil de navigatrice, dissipant toute sensation de menace.{/n} « Merci... je crois ? Vos paroles m'ont été... d'une grande aide. Je me sens un peu mieux... »

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kapatan Cassia'nın vücudunun titremesi, azalarak duruyor. Elini yorgun argın hareket ettirerek alnındaki süsü düzeltiyor. Rotacı gözünü itinayla kapatınca az önce Cassia'dan aldığın tehdit hissini artık hissetmiyorsun.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Dediklerinin bana yardımı dokundu. Biraz daha iyi hissediyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia closes her eyes and the tremors in her body taper to a stop. With a weary movement of her hand, she adjusts her forehead adornment, taking care to cover her Navigator's eye, and you no longer feel the menace that was emanating from her a moment ago.{/n} "Thank... you? Your words, they helped. I feel a little better..."
